name: Ball Toss Deluxe
description:
The same great game play as the original free game Ball Toss! No upgrades in function!! One less color than the free version!!! Do you really want blue this badly?!?!?!

Experience all the excitement of throwing a ball and… I said this is the same game already, right?

Toss & Catch Mode: Rack up… Look, lots of games have a pay version that adds a feature to the free version. This is the only one that takes something away from the free game as well.

All four colors available in Ball Toss Super Deluxe.
